# Clay

generate laterite clay
host
hardness 0.6
texture strata:blocks/clay/laterite
convertsTo minecraft:clay

ore sodium_bentonite
type clay
hardness 1.5
texture strata:blocks/clay/sodium_bentonite

ore calcium_bentonite
type clay
hardness 1.5
texture strata:blocks/clay/calcium_bentonite

ore kaolinite
type clay
hardness 1.5
texture strata:blocks/clay/kaolinite

ore vermiculite
type clay
hardness 1.5
texture strata:blocks/clay/vermiculite

# Ground

generate peat ground
host
hardness 0.5
sustains Plains
burnTime 800
texture strata:blocks/ground/peat

# Sand

generate basaltic_mineral_sand sand
hardness 1.0
sustains Beach Desert
texture strata:blocks/sand/basaltic_mineral_sand

generate cassiterite_sand sand
hardness 1.0
sustains Beach Desert
texture strata:blocks/sand/cassiterite_sand

generate garnet_sand sand
hardness 1.0
sustains Beach Desert
texture strata:blocks/sand/garnet_sand

generate granitic_mineral_sand sand
hardness 1.0
sustains Beach Desert
texture strata:blocks/sand/granitic_mineral_sand

generate quartz_sand sand
hardness 1.0
sustains Beach Desert
texture strata:blocks/sand/quartz_sand

generate volcanic_ash sand
hardness 1.0
texture strata:blocks/sand/volcanic_ash

generate glauconite sand
hardness 1.0
texture strata:blocks/sand/glauconite

generate diatomite sand
hardness 1.0
texture strata:blocks/sand/diatomite
textureCaps strata:blocks/sand/diatomite_caps

generate sulfur sand
hardness 1.0
texture strata:blocks/sand/sulfur

generate oil_sand sand
hardness 1.0
texture strata:blocks/sand/oil_sand

# Weak

generate breccia stone
host
hardness 1.0
texture strata:blocks/stone/weak/breccia

generate breccia cobble
hardness 1.5
texture strata:overlays/cobble normal 86 strata:blocks/stone/weak/breccia

generate breccia cobblemossy
hardness 1.5
texture strata:overlays/mossy_cobble normal 100 strata:overlays/cobble normal 86 strata:blocks/stone/weak/breccia

generate breccia stonebrick
hardness 1.0
texture strata:overlays/brick_highlight lighten 21 strata:overlays/brick_shadow darken 30 strata:blocks/stone/weak/breccia

# Strong

generate andesite stone
host
harvestLevel 1
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/stone/strong/andesite

harvestLevel 1
hardness 2.5
texture strata:overlays/cobble normal 95 strata:blocks/stone/strong/andesite

generate andesite cobblemossy
harvestLevel 1
hardness 2.5
texture strata:overlays/mossy_cobble normal 100 strata:overlays/cobble normal 95 strata:blocks/stone/strong/andesite

hardness 2.0
